data.name: Dark Sheep - Master Chapter
data.detailed_description:
More Levels, More Challenge

The Master Chapter brings 30 new challenging levels that will test your mastery of Dark Sheep. These levels combine the puzzle elements of the original game and its free content update Aftermath.


Can you overcome the challenge that the Master Chapter provides?

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1942310/Dark_Sheep__Master_Chapter/
data.about_the_game:
More Levels, More Challenge

The Master Chapter brings 30 new challenging levels that will test your mastery of Dark Sheep. These levels combine the puzzle elements of the original game and its free content update Aftermath.


Can you overcome the challenge that the Master Chapter provides?

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1942310/Dark_Sheep__Master_Chapter/
data.short_description: Want more challenge? Then you'll love Master Chapter for Dark Sheep! The Master chapter combines the unique puzzle elements of the original game and the free content update Aftermath into 30 challenging but fair levels that will test your wits.

pc_requirements.minimum:

  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 2.1
